TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a .

span.span: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合會保存所有物件指派給控制項。The collection holds all the objects that are assigned to the control. 此集合中的樹狀節點稱為根樹狀節點。The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes. 任何後續會新增至根樹狀節點的樹狀節點稱為子節點。Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node. 因為每個可以包含其他集合物件，您可能會發現很難判斷您樹狀結構中的位置，當您逐一查看集合。Because each can contain a collection of other objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection. 您可以剖析字串使用字串值，以判斷 where標籤開始和結束。You can parse the string by using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 您可以藉由指派顯示影像的樹狀節點旁至屬性及參考的索引值中指派的。You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an to the property and referencing the index value of an in the to assign that . 若要指派映像使用下列屬性：Use the following properties to assign images: - 設定屬性的索引值您想要顯示當未選取樹狀節點。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is not selected. - 設定屬性的索引值您想要顯示選取樹狀節點時。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is selected. 所參考的映像和屬性值會指派給所有樹狀節點都顯示之預設影像集合。The images referenced by the and property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the collection. 個別的樹狀節點可以設定覆寫預設映像和屬性。Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the and properties. 中所顯示之狀態影像是 16 x 16 像素 x 預設值。The state images displayed in the are 16 x 16 pixels by default. 設定屬性不會影響在映像的顯示方式。Setting the property of the will have no effect on how the images are displayed. 不過，狀態影像會調整的大小根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 展開樹狀節點可以顯示子樹狀節點的下一個層級。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 使用者可以展開按一下加號 （+） 按鈕，如果旁邊顯示，您可以展開或藉由呼叫方法。The user can expand the by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the , or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展開子樹狀結構節點中的所有層級集合，請呼叫方法。To expand all the child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以摺疊子藉由呼叫層級方法或使用者可以按的減號 （-） 按鈕，如果旁邊顯示。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the . 您也可以呼叫之間切換展開和摺疊狀態的方法。You can also call the method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states. 樹狀節點可以選擇性地顯示核取方塊。Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes. 若要顯示核取方塊，設定屬性至`true`。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 屬性設定為`true`為樹狀節點處於選取狀態。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性從或事件造成引發的事件，多次，而且可能會造成非預期的行為。Setting the property from within the or event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior. 例如，您可能會設定的事件處理常式，當您以遞迴方式更新，讓使用者不必展開並檢查每一個個別的子節點的屬性。For example, you might set the property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually. 若要避免事件所引發的許多次，將邏輯加入至您只有才會執行您遞迴的程式碼的事件處理常式屬性未設定為。To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the property of the is not set to . 如需如何執行此動作的範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的或事件。For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the or events. 您可以變更的外觀藉由設定的某些顯示和樣式屬性的控制項。You can change the appearance of the control by setting some of its display and style properties. 設定至`true`會顯示每旁邊的加號或減號按鈕，可以展開或摺疊，分別。Setting to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively. 設定屬性`true`導致顯示聯結在一起的根樹狀結構節點的行。Setting the property to `true` causes the to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together. 您可以顯示藉由設定連接至其根節點的子樹狀節點的行屬性`true`。You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the property to `true`. 設定屬性`true`樹狀節點標籤的外觀，當滑鼠指標經過的變更。Setting the property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them. 當熱追蹤時，樹狀目錄節點標籤採用超連結外觀。When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink. 您可以也完全自訂的外觀控制項。You can also completely customize the appearance of the control. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性以外的值為及處理事件。To do this, set the property to a value other than and handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 設定時， ， ，和屬性在執行階段，控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱) 更新控制項的外觀。When setting the , , , and properties at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 這會導致所有摺疊，除了所選取的樹狀節點。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. [!code-csharp[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/vb/form1.vb#10)] 在下列、 更複雜的程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following, more complex code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，會顯示 15 訂單的 1,000 位客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重繪隱藏使用和方法和等候顯示時會建立並繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 這個範例需要您有`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您擁有名為游標檔`MyWait.cur`在於應用程式目錄中，而且您已建立的執行個體上控制。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會展開所有節點，並加入處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有節點摺疊。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件處理常式決定指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點已檢查子系，摺疊會取消該節點。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 若要讓標準節點摺疊，按一下節點旁邊的減號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行為也可以藉由處理實作事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者藉由編輯非根的樹狀節點。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠，的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取非根的樹狀節點，則它會放入可編輯的狀態，可讓使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字評估，以及儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 此範例中，有數個字元視為不在標籤文字中無效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是在標籤字串中，或字串是空的則會通知使用者錯誤的標籤會傳回到其先前的文字。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會展開所有節點，並加入處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有節點摺疊。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件處理常式決定指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點已檢查子系，摺疊會取消該節點。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 若要讓標準節點摺疊，按一下節點旁邊的減號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行為也可以藉由處理實作事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 完整的範例，請參閱建構函式的參考主題。For the complete example, see the constructor reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 為維護效能，而項目會加入一次一個，呼叫方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法會讓控制項繪製直到方法呼叫。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要將項目加入至樹狀檢視控制項的慣用的方法是使用方法，將樹狀目錄節點項目的陣列加入至樹狀檢視。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 不過，如果您想要一次新增一個項目，使用方法，以防止控制項從 新增作業期間的繪製。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允許繼續繪製控制項，請呼叫時所有樹狀節點已都加入至樹狀檢視的方法。To allow the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，會顯示 15 訂單的 1,000 位客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重繪隱藏使用和方法和等候顯示時會建立並繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 這個範例需要您有`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您擁有名為游標檔`MyWait.cur`在於應用程式目錄中，而且您已建立的執行個體上控制。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取方塊會顯示左邊的樹狀節點標籤和 樹狀節點，若有的話。A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node , if any. 核取方塊可讓使用者一次選取多個樹狀節點。Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time. 當屬性設為`true`，和設定屬性，則每個包含在顯示的第一個和第二個映像從表示若未選取或核取狀態，分別。When the property of a is set to `true`, and the property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. 不過，顯示映像可能會不同，如果發生下列情況： 如果節點的設定為 0 或 1，以外的值和屬性之父代設為`false`、則不會自動重設為-1，表示未設定。However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the property of the parent is set to `false`, the will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set. 在此情況下，會顯示在指定的索引位置之狀態影像。In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown. 如果設`true`同樣地，第一個和第二個影像的來分別表示 checked 或 unchecked 狀態，會顯示。If is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 設定時屬性在執行階段，控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱) 更新控制項的外觀。When setting the property at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 這會導致所有摺疊，除了所選取的樹狀節點。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會摺疊所有節點，並加入處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有節點展開。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件處理常式決定指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點沒有已檢查的子系，擴充會取消該節點。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要讓標準的節點展開，按一下節點旁邊的加號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行為也可以藉由處理實作事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點通常會由作業系統繪製。The nodes of a are typically drawn by the operating system. 屬性可讓您自訂的外觀的節點。The property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes. 若要這樣做，請設定至或和提供的處理常式事件。To do this, set to or and provide a handler for the event. 這稱為主控描繪。This is called owner drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括將自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件可自訂外觀中的節點使用主控描繪控制項。Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 會引發這個事件時，才屬性設定為值或。This event is raised only when the property is set to values of or . 下表指出如何可以當自訂屬性設定為這些值。The following table indicates how the can be customized when the property is set to these values. |DrawMode 屬性值DrawMode property value|TreeNode 自訂TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| ||標籤區域可以自訂。The label area can be customized. 所有其他自動繪製項目。All other elements are drawn automatically.| ||整個外觀可以自訂。The appearance of the entire can be customized. 圖示的核取方塊，加號和減號，而且如果需要連接節點的線條也必須以手動方式繪製。Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| 區域的會佔用值，如果它已使用所指定的字型來繪製控制項的屬性是在其中一個節點可以按一下來選取它的區域。The region that the value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the control's property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 這稱為點擊的測試區域。This is called the hit test region. 如果您在此區域之外繪製時，您應該提供自己的程式碼，在按下的可見區域時選取的節點。If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked. 點擊的測試區域對應至屬性使用時。The hit test region corresponds to the property when using . 當使用，不過屬性包含的整個寬度。When using , however, the property encompasses the entire width of the . 在此情況下，您可以存取的點擊的測試區域取得值及存取其屬性。In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the value and accessing its property. 然後，您可以繪製這些的範圍內節點的點擊的測試區域，或您可以提供自己的點擊的測試程式碼。You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code. 請注意，屬性不會變更的點擊的測試區域，會計算整個使用指定之字型的大小。Note that setting the property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire . 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括將自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式節點標記和自訂選取反白顯示手動事件繪製。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`，以便他們將會由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，處理常式事件提供的點擊測試。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 根據預設，您可以選取節點，只能透過按一下其標籤周圍的區域。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件處理常式選取的節點，在此區域內，或節點的標記，周圍區域內任何位置按一下，如果有的話。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 為維護效能，而項目會加入一次一個，呼叫方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法會讓控制項繪製直到方法呼叫。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要將項目加入至樹狀檢視控制項的慣用的方法是使用方法，將樹狀目錄節點項目的陣列加入至樹狀檢視。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 不過，如果您想要一次新增一個項目，使用方法，以防止控制項從 新增作業期間的繪製。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允許繼續繪製控制項的控制項，呼叫時所有樹狀節點已都加入至樹狀檢視的方法。To allow control the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，會顯示 15 訂單的 1,000 位客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重繪隱藏使用和方法和等候顯示時會建立並繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 這個範例需要您有`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您擁有名為游標檔`MyWait.cur`在於應用程式目錄中，而且您已建立的執行個體上控制。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用拖放作業內控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在此範例中，可以將任何節點拖曳到另一個不是被拖曳的節點的子系的節點。In this example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 拖曳的節點，包含所有子系的節點，會變成目的地節點的子系。The dragged node, which includes all its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 使用滑鼠左鍵時，拖曳的節點會移至目的地節點。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 使用滑鼠右鍵時，拖曳的節點會複製到目的地節點。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只適用於屬性是`true`。The method works only if the property is `true`. 如果是`false`當您嘗試編輯標籤時，將會擲回例外狀況和樹狀目錄節點將無法放入可編輯的狀態。If is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者藉由編輯非根的樹狀節點。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠，的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取非根的樹狀節點，則它會放入可編輯的狀態，可讓使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字評估，以及儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 此範例中，有數個字元視為不在標籤文字中無效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是在標籤字串中，或字串是空的則會通知使用者錯誤的標籤會傳回到其先前的文字。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下滑鼠，包括加號的樹狀節點的任何部分，就會發生這個事件 (**+**) 或減號 (**-**)，指出是否要摺疊節點或展開。This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. summary.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a with the mouse.

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按兩下滑鼠，包括加號 （+） 或減號 （-），表示節點是否已摺疊或展開樹狀任何的節點部分，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件以及如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含在 Windows Form名為`treeView1`。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 填入`treeView1`位於檔案的名稱取代`c:\`目錄的系統，執行此範例中，而且關聯事件`treeView1`與`treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick`方法在此範例中。Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example. 這個範例會要求使用者執行此範例的電腦上具有系統管理員權限。This example requires that the user has administrator privileges on the machine running the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果透過滑鼠位於、事件發生之前事件。If the mouse is located over a , the event will occur before the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.

span.span: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.

value.span: A代表指派給樹狀檢視控制項的樹狀節點。

span.span: A that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會保存的集合物件，每一個都有可以包含它自己的屬性。The property holds a collection of objects, each of which has a property that can contain its own . 此巢狀結構的樹狀節點難以瀏覽樹狀結構中，但屬性可讓您更輕鬆地判斷您在樹狀結構內的位置。This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，會顯示 15 訂單的 1,000 位客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重繪隱藏使用和方法和等候顯示時會建立並繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 這個範例需要您有`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您已建立的執行個體上控制。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
